question: Will all customers have to end their current insurance and select a new policy on Pennie?
text:
Will all customers have to end their current insurance and select a new policy on Pennie?
          
        
NO, a customer who currently has marketplace coverage on the FFM can keep that same policy if it is still offered by their insurance provider, and they remain eligible for that coverage. However, we strongly encourage all customers to head to Pennie.com to update their account if they need to and to learn about their coverage options each year.
